alert.note: Alert for Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:51PM CDT until June 14 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GRANT...EAST CENTRAL GARLAND...SOUTH CENTRAL SALINE AND NORTHEASTERN HOT SPRING COUNTIES... At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lonsdale, or 10 miles west of Benton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Benton... Bryant... Haskell... Traskwood... Tull... Lonsdale... Salem in Saline County... Otter Creek... Alexander... Bauxite... Avilla... Magnet Cove... Fenter... Nance... Shaw... Congo... Glen Rose... Buie... Grape... Crows... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
